channel.title: How do you make doors open, and add objects/npc's?
channel.description:
Ok guys i need a tut on how to get a door to open, and how to add objects (like banks)
Also how do you add npc's what say "welcome to TweezyScape" or something like that... Over there head??
Ty in advance for all ya'll help
Johno :)
